channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

item.title: [LIM1][Global Infrastructure] CPU temperature
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 19, 19:30 - 21:30 UTC

Jun 23, 03:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/07/2022 19:30 UTC
End time : 19/07/2022 21:30 UTC
Service impact : There will be an expected 20 mins of downtime per server
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to fix CPU temperature sensor bug.

item.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - resetHwFlag removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 18, 07:00 - 07:10 UTC

Jun 17, 12:12 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 18/07/2022 07:10 UTC
Service impact : Customers using APIv6 with resetHwRaid within their scripts will get an error.
In order to solve the error, impacted customers should remove the flag from the script("POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start" "resetHwFlag" in "details").
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we will be making modifications to the baremetal software to remove the resetHwRaid optional flag, which could cause confusion as it is now performed systematically.

item.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - Rack R716B07
item.description:
Jun 24, 22:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/06/2022 21:10 UTC
End Time : 24/06/2022 22:08 UTC
Service impact : Some servers were down.
Root cause : Cooling system malfunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Impacted servers are up anew.

Jun 24, 21:21 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/06/2022 21:10 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are down.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on investigate the root cause and resolving the issue. We will post update as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - 46B21 - 46B22 - 46B23
item.description:
Jun 24, 14:15 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/06/2022 06:54 UTC
End time : 24/06/2022 13:56 UTC
Service impact : All servers on the following racks 46B21, 46B22 and 46B23 are operational.
No data loss to report. The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause: The disjunction is due to a water leak on one of our network equipment

Jun 24, 13:29 UTC
Update - Update: All servers in the rack 46B22 are operational since 13:14 UTC

Jun 24, 12:52 UTC
Identified - Update: All servers are actually unreachable on rack 46B22.

Jun 24, 11:11 UTC
Update - Update: 90% of the impacted servers are up, we will come back to you as soon as possible.

Jun 24, 09:40 UTC
Update - Update: All servers in the rack 46B23 are operational since 09:20 UTC, for the 2 remaining racks 46B22 and 46B21, we have 80% of servers that are also operational. We continue to work on this incident to restore services on the remaining servers.

Jun 24, 08:24 UTC
Update - Update: We have 60% of servers that are operational now out of the total number of impacted servers.
Our teams continue to work on this incident to restore the service quickly.

Jun 24, 07:34 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/06/2022 06:54 UTC
Service impact : Some servers on the following racks 46B21, 46B22 and 46B23 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating the source of this issue.

item.title: [GRA2][DedicatedServers] - Rack G251B02
item.description:
Jun 23, 14:11 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/06/2022 11:50 UTC
End time : 23/06/2022 13:47 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issues. All impacted servers are up anew.

Jun 23, 13:09 UTC
Identified - Impacted servers are coming back up gradually.
Our technical teams are hands on the remaining impacted servers.

Jun 23, 12:38 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/06/2022 11:50 UTC
Service impact : All servers in rack G251B02 unexpectedly shut down.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. We will post update as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][Veeam] - License expiration
item.description:
Jun 23, 12:50 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 31/05/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 23/06/2022 12:17 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a lack of licence. The incident is closed.

Jun 16, 12:26 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams have advanced in the resolution of the incident.
They are still working to solve the problem.

May 31, 12:49 UTC
Identified - Start time: 31/05/2022 08:00 UTC
User impact : While updating the Veeam license, customers could see a message that it is expired since 31th May, but we still have a 60 days extension. The service will work as usual and there is no impact on the customers infrastructure.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area): all
Scope of impact : Veeam
Ongoing actions : Updating the license on our side

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - 21A04
item.description:
Jun 23, 07:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/06/2022 07:32 UTC
End Time : 23/06/2022 09:20 UTC
Service impact : 13 servers unreachable.
Root cause : Circuit breaker tripped causing the loss of all 13 servers.

item.title: [RBX][DedicatedServer] - Deliveries and vRack tasks
item.description:
Jun 22, 16:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 22/06/2022 14:15 UTC
End time : 22/06/2022 16:34 UTC
Service impact : Some clients might had seen deliveries blocked or vRack tasks not working.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Deliveries and vRacks are working as prior the incident.

Jun 22, 16:14 UTC
Update - Following our technical teams' feedback, here is some complementary information :
Some client might see deliveries blocked or vRack tasks not working.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue. We will post update as the situation progress.

Jun 22, 15:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 22/06/2022 14:15 UTC
Service impact : API slowness might be observed on HCI / Scale / HGR servers ranges.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are already working on resolving the issue. We will post update as significant progress is made.

item.title: [Global][OperatingSystem] - Removing Netboot booting option
item.description:
Jun 21, 13:09 UTC
Completed - Maintenance has been completed.

Jun 21, 11:25 UTC
Verifying - The maintenance has been postponed.

Jun 21, 11:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
